data.name: Infinite Crisis™
data.detailed_description:
NOTICE: Game is closing August 14th.




A sudden assault threatens the DC Multiverse. All realities stand on the brink of annihilation. Now, the last hope for Earth lies in the powers of the DC legends. Infinite Crisis blends RPG and strategy to create a fast-paced multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA).

A Multiverse of Champions
Command the largest roster of playable heroes and villains ever assembled from DC Comics – Batman to the Joker, Wonder Woman to Doomsday.

Play champions inspired by the 52 worlds of the DC Multiverse, where heroes and villains are shaped by post-apocalypse Earth, living nightmare landscapes, and an alternate age of steam-powered technology. Many more heroes and villains will be called to become champions in the coming months.

Clash in Coast City
A faster two-lane map, Coast City demands fresh and flexible strategy. Balance lane advancement with controlling critical objectives including
  • Massive Urban Jungle - Fight for control of the jungle whose hidden creatures and important objectives are critical for any team's success
  • Beneficial Power Relays - Claim control of as many Power Relays as you can to earn your team additional credits and enhance the strength of your team's defenses
  • The Doomsday Device - Harness mysterious technology to fire a destructive blast of energy at a target of your choice, devastating your enemies and their defenses or neutralizing a relay they control
  • A Reactive Environment - Reduce buildings to rubble as you hurl cars, call down meteors, and battle enemies with powerful skills

Learn the Ropes from the Justice League
Whether you're new to MOBAs or only to Infinite Crisis, it's easy to get started with our series of fun tutorial missions. Discover the role you'll play in the survival of the Multiverse from DC heroes like Superman, Wonder Woman, Green Lantern, and Batman.

Learn the basics of the genre, what makes Infinite Crisis different, and practice your skills against AI opponents before jumping into great team combat with other players.

data.short_description: A sudden assault threatens the DC Multiverse. All realities stand on the brink of annihilation. Now, the last hope for Earth lies in the powers of the DC legends. Infinite Crisis blends RPG and strategy to create a fast-paced multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA).
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® Vista 32-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 or ATI Radeon X1300/X1550 for Desktop, Intel HD Graphics 3000 for Laptop
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 Series or ATI Radeon HD 5000 for Desktop, Discrete GPU for Laptops
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
